reviewText: Exactly what I was looking for and disc are perfect and subtitles work! Thank you!

This is formatted for DVD9. It does not clarify on the products description, so it only works on my original ps3. Other than that, the dvds do work, just wish they would put it in the description that it is DVD9 and not DVD-RW
I was hoping that the series had an English dubbed version but even in subtitles I still love the series so happy is what I am!!!!!
